"Souya": "The more we consume, the more we'll want to obtain."
"You too should make a point of picking up whatever you find out there."
"Yo! I heard about what you've done for us."
"But, that doesn't mean our work out here in Stia is done."
"In fact, we're even busier now than we were before."
"...So that's why I wanted to ask you for your help again."
"I'm currently investigating the Red Containers out here in the Stia region."
"Gather as much data as you can in each area of Stia."
"Hm... So you're busy as well, then... Alright, I'll ask you some other time."
"You were able to find quite a lot of the Red Containers out there."
"Thanks to that, we were also able to get some valuable information."
"Still though, who would have put all those containers inside a volcano?"
"...Well, I guess I'll leave that sort of investigation to the researchers."
"At any rate, thanks to your help, we've markedly improved our storage situation."
"Thanks for your cooperation. Really, we all appreciate it."
"I'm not too good at fighting, but when it comes to caring about my comrades, I'll give anyone a run for their money."
"Behind the scenes, I'll be supporting my comrades--including you--every step of the way."
